commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm here. I'm finally here.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: This is Numazu.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The birthplace of Aqours, somewhere I've only ever seen in videos before.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's really lively. Maybe it's just around the station though.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I bet the Aqours members go shopping and ride the trains around here, too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh look, paper lanterns. I wonder if there's a festival going on.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nice! I may have come at a wonderful time!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wait, I shouldn't be thinking about that.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I didn't come here to hang out. I came to meet Aqours and find out what makes them so charming.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Good job on the show! It was fantastic.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Y-You thought so? Thanks! I'm overjoyed to hear you say that.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What, no compliments for me? That's unfair. You know I worked really hard too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You were awesome too, Kasumi.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Everyone was shining so brightly up there. It was incredible!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Ahaha! Your compliments give me so much dren I could fly to Saturn! Like Whoosh!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Dren? What does that mean? I've never heard of it.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Short for adrenaline!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Oh, I get it! There are still so many words I don't know. Thanks for explaining it.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You really don't need to remember that one. Besides, it barely sounds like adrenaline.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: The live show...is over, right? Can I sleep now? Good night.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Whoa, whoa, whoa! You can't sleep here!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Eeek! Why are you leaning on me?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: The venue was filled with so much passion, and the audience with so much love...and we got to feel it directly! Ahh, there's nothing better than being a school idol!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I was nervous. It was all so different from acting in a play. My heart is still racing.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, the passion of the crowd got to me, too. I couldn't stop shaking.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And I was just in the crowd. The pressure must have been so intense for all you up there on the stage.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: But we did it. We can be in the School Idol Festival now.

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: *Gasp*

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: The School Idol Festival. The dream festival that gathers the nation's school idols in one place!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'll actually be standing on such a big stage.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: The scale of it is so big I can hardly grasp it. Well, let's do it anyway!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I may have been nervous, but I can't wait for the next one! I'm going to practice more and work on my stage presence!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I have to tell my family in Switzerland when we get back. They'll sure be surprised!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I might have to up the expressions on the Rina-chan Board.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Might be better to work on not needing the board in the first pl-- Kanata, get off me already! You weigh a ton!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Zzz...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: We'll perform at the School Idol Festival just like... No, even better than we did here!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I won't let anyone upstage me. I'm going to capture the hearts of everyone there!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's true. Everyone shined so brilliantly that day.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The culmination of all their practice. I honestly think they gave it 100%.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But...the School Idol Festival is a huge event with 's and Aqours, along with every other school idol group in the country.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Just like Setsuna said, in order to win an event like that they'd have to do even better than that day... They'd have to improve further!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: There is something I can do to help them achieve that.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Write songs.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm going to write the best song for everyone to sing proudly on that big, dream stage!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I've been wondering about something ever since I saw 's and Aqours do a live show together.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: How do their song, dance, and each and every expression strike me so hard? How are they so unforgettable?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I need to know the answer in order to write the best song ever!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'll use my summer vacation to get to the bottom of it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Although... Where are all the members of Aqours?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's summer vacation, so maybe they're at home? Oh no, I don't know any of their addresses!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Urgh, that's what I get for not actually planning this out. I did kind of rush out in the heat of the moment.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: For now, I'll go to Uranohoshi Girls' High School. They might be there practicing or taking summer courses.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Gasp* *Wheeze* I made it. Uranohoshi High.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That was a seriously steep hill. Walking up and down that daily must make for good training.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Sigh* Okay, let's see if Aqours is here.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Hey, there's somebody. She has a uniform on, so maybe she's a student here. I should ask her.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: E-Excuse me!

commands.speaker: Yoshimi
commands.line: Yes? Can I help you?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Um, I was hoping to meet the members of Aqours. Are they here today?

commands.speaker: Mutsu
commands.line: Aqours? I haven't seen them today. They've been coming for the past few days to get ready for the festival, though.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A festival? Oh yeah, I saw paper lanterns all over town. So Aqours is involved in that?

commands.speaker: Itsuki
commands.line: Yes. That's all for the Numazu Summer Festival. I heard Aqours will perform, too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's awesome!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Of course Aqours would do that! Joining a local event and helping with the prep? Now that's hometown love.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Have I already found what makes them so charming?)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I wish I could have met them face to face though. Oh well.

commands.speaker: Mutsu
commands.line: Aqours isn't here, but why don't you try the beach instead? I know it's a strange second option.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The beach?

commands.speaker: Mutsu
commands.line: Uchiura has a great view of the ocean. Everyone in Aqours loves the beach, too. Maybe you'll find one of them there.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sounds good, I'll check it out! Thanks.
